content: How do I change my role? I ended up in online engagement, but I'm not really social media savvy. How do I switch my role to something like back office volunteering or data entry or postcards? Thanks!

Hi Kerry! Just go back to <id:customize> <click/tap here and deselect/select the roles you prefer. Vote Team is the best place for data entry type work. We do not have a team doing postcards at this time. Thank you!
<@957714233217409174> I'm looking for data entry/analysis tasks as well. I signed up for Data Captain training for this Wed. night. But on Channels & Roles I don't see an option for Vote Team.

All teams except Online Engagement and Hosts require everyone take a training first (sign up for an event at the links in general chat or on https://events.democrats.org) then there's a process to be approved to access each team's channels in this server. So you'll get access instructions in your training essentially! Very soon! Almost there!
Do you have any volunteer work for data entry and office work I have those experiences? What is the best recommendation?
Hi <@1254167148457103405> we have data captains for our phone bank sessions and for our vote team sessions. Look for an upcoming training in our daily announcements.
Thank you Carolyn that is great! I definitely want to go for the data captains for those sessions! I will check the daily announcements!
